desc: Buy high-quality supplements for your pet's health needs. Cappet uses carringly-sourced ingredients, manufactures exclusively in America, and is dedicated to helping humans understand pet health so you can make smart choices for the animals who depend on you.

layout.text: Support your aging dog's hip and joint health
As dogs age, they often experience hip and joint issues, including arthritis, hip dysplasia, and joint pain and stiffness.
